response.name: Successful authorization

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: P3P
header.value: CP="IDC DSP COR ADM DEVi TAIi PSA PSD IVAi IVDi CONi HIS OUR IND CNT"
header.description: This header is supposed to set P3P policy, in the form of P3P:CP="your_compact_policy". However, P3P did not take off, most browsers have never fully implemented it, a lot of websites set this header with fake policy text, that was enough to fool browsers the existence of P3P policy and grant permissions for third party cookies.

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: X-Endo-ID
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: X-UA-Compatible
header.description: Custom header

response.body:
OK
action=PAIRED
authToken=K-0wvH-1TnSzjb3V2dh7KA
measure=METRIC
displayName=Patryk Najda
userId=1608787
facebookConnected=true
secureToken=ENanqxwLTo2NzILEHT8tlg
